label: 張鷟
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (657-730). Pen name Wencheng 文成. Supposedly wrote the You xianku 遊仙窟 (A Visit to the Cave of the Immortals"), which subsequently was lost in China but survived within Japan. "
